titles.title: National Intersection and Interchange Safety Construction Program Act of 2017
National Intersection and Interchange Safety Construction Program Act of 2017
To direct the Secretary of Transportation to establish a national intersection and interchange safety construction program, and for other purposes.
National Intersection and Interchange Safety Construction Program Act of 2017

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.
